overview:
Mayank Verma is a young and flexible Social Media Guru and Virtual Assistant operating to build strong, industrial relationships with business. He welcomes new challenges and assignments; and have a good record of providing skilled assistance, whatever your budget. With his work ethic of prompt delivery and good communication, he is able make considerable difference to your business.

He is a certified Internet Consultant, and have been running his Internet Consultancy since March 2009. He provides solo service professionals,with intelligent business support so that they can spend more time doing what they do best! He does this by taking a lot of the day-to-day administrative and marketing tasks off their hands.

Prior to starting his business he had worked as a Fashion Photographer of various advertising agencies, Graphic Designer for his own College. He had also worked on many Freelance Web / Graphic Design Projects.

Apart from being a Bachelor of Computer Application he posses various programming and IT-related certifications. He is also a certified HIPAA professional.

Since becoming an Internet Consultant in 2008 he has become an expert in online business management, social media marketing and search engine optimization and have an international client base. He prides himself on working with my clients personally, and providing them with world class administrative support. In fact he only work with a very small number of clients at any one time to ensure this high level of personal service.

His Clients are busy solo professionals who are looking to develop a long-term, collaborative, partnership with an online business manager. They fully understand the value of partnering with an Internet Professional and what it can bring to their business.

He is currently living in Ratangarh, India with his Family.When he is not busy running his business he enjoys photography and planning his weekly schedule. He also loves to travel and very much fascinated by studio lifestyle.
